H0.text: Which Japanese company has bought Horizon Nuclear Power and so has the contract to build nuclear power stations in Britain from 2015. Toshiba

H1.text: Which Japanese company has bought Horizon Nuclear Power and so has the contract to build nuclear power stations in Britain from 2015. Mitsubishi Heavy Industries

H2.text: Which Japanese company has bought Horizon Nuclear Power and so has the contract to build nuclear power stations in Britain from 2015. Fuji Electric

H3.text: Which Japanese company has bought Horizon Nuclear Power and so has the contract to build nuclear power stations in Britain from 2015. 日立

A4.text: Hitachi bought Horizon for £696 million, and the sale was completed on 26 November 2012.
